name: QTip
description: QTip is a text hosting service

QTIP_AUTH_TOKEN.description: A secret key used for validating qtip requests. Essentially your password for your CLI to access this server

AWS_S3_ENDPOINT.description: The aws S3 endpoint for image uploads. If no endpoint is provided, you will not be able to upload images!

QTIP_AWS_S3_BUCKET.description: The aws S3 bucket for image uploads

QTIP_AWS_S3_TOP_LEVEL_FOLDER.description: Optional: The folder in S3 where images will be uploaded to

QTIP_FILE_SYSTEM_NAME.description: The name of your qtip file system
